resources.string:
The application began with a single question, if we don't have a wireless mouse or wireless keyboard can we use android phone/tablet computer to control the personal computer freely ? Without a doubt, Let's we use the Wireless Controller to have a try.
 1.Connect personal computer and android phone/tablet computer at the same wireless network by WiFi.
 2.Start Server application.
 3.Start Wireless Controller application.
 and you can got it.
 Support:
 shmcclmm@gmail.com
 iloveameizi@gmail.com
            Yours Sincerely.
            Mr. Lin
What does U want mobile to be??
